text: I've been trying to add html elements to a section template in the theme i'm working on, but it seems like it's stripped out in the output, is this correct? (i really just want to add a class to row to be able to change the order for alternating rows on mobile)
You can't add classes to rows, only dnd elements you can add classes are saved sections "dnd_section" and "dnd_area"

Ok, I'm trying to make a section that a user can drag onto the page that contains a couple of rows of alternating order, a fairly normal pattern, on desktop it would be two columns and one on mobile, but the order changes on mobile.

`text1 img1`
`img2 text2`

and on mobile

`text1`
`img1`
`text2`
`img2`

I could make a big module that has text and image in the same module, but i really just want dnd areas that change order on mobile..
Yea, I hope that one day that would be possible directly from the content editor, sadly as for now I usually create a saved section with a custom class that swap the order on mobile
Ok, then that's the way to go, thanks for verifying
